text:
When I tried to register two apache services each with different conf files (-f
directive), Apache monitor crashes, when trying to open apache services.

Service names Apache2PHP4, ApachPHP4, PHP4, none helped, description to service
given, also didn't help, copy whole apache directory and registered another bin,
also didn't.
creator: dr.diesel@seznam.cz
wrowe@apache.org
text:
http://httpd.apache.org/dev/debugging.html describes how to use dr watson
and the apachemonitor.pdb file to evaluate what happened here.

FYI various bugs have been fixed, closing as invalid since we didn't see
a backtrace as requested, but encourage you to try out the current version,
and even 2.2.9 release for additional fixes. 

p.s. in 2.2.8 and 2.2.9 you can simply install the ApacheMonitor component
alone from a Custom Install, no need to install all of httpd, and it should
recognize your 2.0.59 and earlier servers.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
